name: Raskoti Magar
label: Software Engineer
summary: Web developer crafting intuitive, responsive websites that balance form and function. I turn ideas into clean, efficient code—building digital experiences that work seamlessly across devices. Passionate about solving problems through thoughtful development and staying ahead of industry trends.

work_experience.company: LASP (Labratory for Atmospheric and Space Physics)
highlights: Created and maintained back-end API services using Flask.
Created system administration scripts using Python to automate the processing and deployment of mission-critical data.
Tasked with migrating in-house data pipelines to a cloud-based solution using AWS.
Developed and designed GIS web applications with the ArcGIS JavaScript API
Wrote and published geoprocessing services using Python and ArcPy
Created backend user authentication systems with PHP and MySQL

work_experience.company: MATRIC (Mid-Atlantic Technology, Research, and Innovation Center)
highlights: Created GIS web applications with ActionScript and the ArcGIS API for Flex.
Developed custom widgets for routing, wind data visualization, and simulations.
Wrote and maintained SQL-based queries to efficiently retrieve and analyze data from GIS REST services.

projects.title: Educational Content Creator on YouTube
projects.summary: Channel focused on creating tutorials and walkthroughs for software developers, programmers, and engineers.

volunteer_experience.summary: Helped residents with any computer problems for two hours each week. Mainly helped with networking, typing, basic instruction, and troubleshooting.
Gave campus tours, organized promotional events, and ran summer orientation.

degrees: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
honors: Placed in a District ACM ICPC Team Programming Contest
